headline: Is Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG) Pricing Look Stretched After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether Chipotle Mexican Grill’s stock now offers value after a volatile stretch, this article walks through how its current price compares with several common valuation yardsticks. The share price recently closed at US$39.18, with returns of 5.9% over 7 days, 16.2% over 30 days, 4.5% year to date, a 32.4% decline over the past year, and gains of 29.5% over 3 years and 38.8% over 5 years. Recent coverage has focused on Chipotle’s longer term track record and how its...
